org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component

Interface ExternalValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, DataComponent, SingleValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalValueImpl

    public interface ExternalValue
extends SingleValue
    A representation of the model object 'External Value'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Connection
    • Source Name

    See Also:
    ComponentPackage.getExternalValue()
